detectors.description:

	- _token.transfer(order.owner,remaining) (SmartexExchange_123.sol#405)
	- _token.transfer(buyer,tokens) (SmartexExchange_123.sol#421)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _splitAndSendWei(weiToSend) (SmartexExchange_123.sol#416)
	- result_scope_0 = order.owner.toPayable().send(weiToSend) (SmartexExchange_123.sol#418)
	- result_scope_0 = owner().toPayable().send(fee) (SmartexExchange_123.sol#422)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Trade(buyer,order.owner,id,tokens,_oracle.currentTokenPrice(),now) (SmartexExchange_123.sol#424)
